comments.en: 1 print cartridge (with toner and drum) per color (Cyan, Magenta, Yellow, blacK)

Fast wide-format colour laser printer which does 21 letter-sized pages/min in both color and grayscale. As the HP Color LaserJet 4600 it processes all four colours simultaneously.

For basic printing functionality use the Postscript PPD. For advanced functionality such as printer status and maintenance features, use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

Various flavors are available, with networking, extra trays, etc.

Duplex in the "D" models, there is no optional duplex for the other models.
